ignoreNotes.content/skills/**/*.zip: Binary skill archives managed outside the codebase; Knip cannot analyze compressed assets.
ignoreNotes.reports/knip/**/*.json: Machine-generated Knip outputs stored for auditing and should not influence unused-code detection.
ignoreNotes.**/.next/**: Next.js build artifacts that re-export compiled output and routinely confuse unused-file scans.
ignoreNotes.**/build/**: Generic build folders emitted by tooling packages; contents are derived from /src and safe to skip.
ignoreNotes.**/dist/**: Package distribution directories compiled from sourceâ€”scanning them duplicates findings and adds noise.
ignoreNotes.**/node_modules/**: External dependencies vendored locally for certain workspaces; excluding prevents redundant scanning.
ignoreNotes.**/*.generated.ts: Codegen outputs (db/services/types) may not have direct imports but are intentionally retained.
ignoreNotes.**/*.generated.tsx: Same as above for React-facing codegen artifacts.
